content:
Learn About Einstein Knowledge Creation

To get started with Knowledge Creation, learn how to identify the right Knowledge fields for each Knowledge record type. Next, review the response type glossary, and see an example of Knowledge Creation in action.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

Knowledge Fields for Einstein Knowledge Creation
Learn how field mapping and response types affect your article drafts.

How To Use Einstein Knowledge Creation Responses Across Article Types
To see how you can tailor your selection of response fields to different types of knowledge articles, take a look at a simple Wi-Fi troubleshooting scenario.

Einstein Knowledge Creation Response Glossary
Get an overview of each mapping option for knowledge article creation.
title: Setting Up Einstein Knowledge Creation
